data.name: Clefable
data.flavorText: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.

data.name: Deoxys
data.flavorText: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.

data.name: Dialga
data.flavorText: This Pokémon completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.

data.name: Espeon
data.flavorText: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy's actions.

data.name: Forretress
data.flavorText: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside this shell is a total mystery.

data.name: Groudon
data.flavorText: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.

data.name: Gyarados
data.flavorText: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.

data.name: Hitmontop
data.flavorText: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

data.name: Ho-Oh
data.flavorText: Legends claim this Pokémon flies the world's skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.

data.name: Houndoom
data.flavorText: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.

data.name: Jirachi
data.flavorText: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.

data.name: Kyogre
data.flavorText: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.

data.name: Leafeon
data.flavorText: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

data.name: Lucario
data.flavorText: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.

data.name: Lugia
data.flavorText: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

data.name: Magmortar
data.flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

data.name: Ninetales
data.flavorText: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.

data.name: Pachirisu
data.flavorText: It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

data.name: Palkia
data.flavorText: Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places or even other dimensions.

data.name: Rayquaza
data.flavorText: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.

data.name: Smeargle
data.flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

data.name: Umbreon
data.flavorText: When agitated, this Pokémon protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.

data.name: Ampharos
data.flavorText: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

data.name: Cleffa
data.flavorText: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

data.name: Feraligatr
data.flavorText: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

data.name: Granbull
data.flavorText: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its bite is powerful.

data.name: Meganium
data.flavorText: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.

data.name: Mismagius
data.flavorText: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

data.name: Mr. Mime
data.flavorText: Its fingertips emit a peculiar force field that hardens air to create an actual wall.

data.name: Pidgeot
data.flavorText: It spreads its beautiful wings wide to frighten its enemies. It can fly at Mach 2 speed.

data.name: Skarmory
data.flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

data.name: Slowking
data.flavorText: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

data.name: Snorlax
data.flavorText: Its stomach's digestive juices can dissolve any kind of poison. It can even eat things off the ground.

data.name: Tangrowth
data.flavorText: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.

data.name: Typhlosion
data.flavorText: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.

data.name: Tyrogue
data.flavorText: Even though it is small, it can't be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.

data.name: Ursaring
data.flavorText: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailing finds all food buried deep underground.

data.name: Weezing
data.flavorText: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.

data.name: Zangoose
data.flavorText: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.

data.name: Bayleef
data.flavorText: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

data.name: Croconaw
data.flavorText: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

data.name: Donphan
data.flavorText: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.

data.name: Flaaffy
data.flavorText: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.

data.name: Flareon
data.flavorText: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Jolteon
data.flavorText: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

data.name: Magby
data.flavorText: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don't underestimate it.

data.name: Mime Jr.
data.flavorText: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

data.name: Pidgeotto
data.flavorText: It renders its prey immobile using well-developed claws, then carries the prey more than 60 miles to its nest.

data.name: Quilava
data.flavorText: This Pokémon is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack.

data.name: Riolu
data.flavorText: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

data.name: Seviper
data.flavorText: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.

data.name: Vaporeon
data.flavorText: When Vaporeon's fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.

data.name: Chikorita
data.flavorText: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up sunrays.

data.name: Clefairy
data.flavorText: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.

data.name: Cyndaquil
data.flavorText: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

data.name: Eevee
data.flavorText: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

data.name: Hitmonchan
data.flavorText: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

data.name: Hitmonlee
data.flavorText: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.

data.name: Houndour
data.flavorText: To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand.

data.name: Koffing
data.flavorText: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.

data.name: Magikarp
data.flavorText: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like Pidgeotto to catch it mid-jump.

data.name: Magmar
data.flavorText: It dislikes cold places, so it blows scorching flames to make the environment suitable for itself.

data.name: Mareep
data.flavorText: Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week.

data.name: Mawile
data.flavorText: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.

data.name: Misdreavus
data.flavorText: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.

data.name: Phanpy
data.flavorText: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.

data.name: Pidgey
data.flavorText: Common in grassy areas and forests, it is very docile and will chase off enemies by flapping up sand.

data.name: Pineco
data.flavorText: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.

data.name: Relicanth
data.flavorText: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.

data.name: Slowpoke
data.flavorText: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.

data.name: Snubbull
data.flavorText: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.

data.name: Tangela
data.flavorText: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.

data.name: Teddiursa
data.flavorText: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.

data.name: Totodile
data.flavorText: It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.

data.name: Vulpix
data.flavorText: If it is attacked by an enemy that is stronger than itself, it feigns injury to fool the enemy and escapes.

data.name: Deoxys
data.flavorText: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.

data.name: Dialga
data.flavorText: This Pokémon completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.

data.name: Entei
data.flavorText: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

data.name: Groudon
data.flavorText: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.

data.name: Ho-Oh
data.flavorText: Legends claim this Pokémon flies the world's skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.

data.name: Kyogre
data.flavorText: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.

data.name: Lugia
data.flavorText: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

data.name: Palkia
data.flavorText: Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places or even other dimensions.

data.name: Raikou
data.flavorText: A Pokémon that races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.

data.name: Rayquaza
data.flavorText: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.

data.name: Suicune
data.flavorText: This Pokémon races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow whenever it appears.
